statements: SELECT * FROM fundraising_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, goal_amount FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE goal_amount >= 5000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, donor_preferences FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, goal_amount, donor_preferences FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY goal_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM fundraising_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, goal_amount FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE goal_amount > 5000 ORDER BY goal_amount DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY campaign_name
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, JSON_BUILD_OBJECT('start_date', start_date, 'end_date', end_date) AS date_range FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01' LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE donor_preferences->>'location' = 'USA' AND donor_preferences->>'interest' = 'Education'
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors ORDER BY donor_name DESC;
SELECT donor_id, donor_preferences FROM donors WHERE donor_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, donor_id FROM donors ORDER BY donor_id ASC;
SELECT donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount >= 100 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT donor_name, donor_phone FROM donors ORDER BY donor_name DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors WHERE donor_preferences ->> 'category' = 'Health';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donation_amount > 5000;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 2 AND donor_preferences ->> 'interest' = 'Education';
SELECT * FROM Donors;
SELECT name, email, preference FROM Donors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, start_date, goal_amount FROM Campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, donor_id, campaign_id, amount, date_given FROM Donations WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM Donors JOIN Donations ON Donors.id = Donations.donor_id WHERE Donors.name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM Donors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Donors WHERE preference = 'preferred';
SELECT id, title, start_date FROM Campaigns WHERE goal_amount > 1000;
SELECT d.name, c.title, dn.amount FROM Donors d JOIN Donations dn ON d.id = dn.donor_id JOIN Campaigns c ON dn.campaign_id = c.id;

SELECT d.name AS donor_name, c.title AS campaign_title, dn.date_given AS donation_date FROM Donors d JOIN Donations dn ON d.id = dn.donor_id JOIN Campaigns c ON dn.campaign_id = c.id WHERE dn.amount >= 500;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors WHERE donor_interests @> ARRAY['animal welfare']::varchar[];
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE preference_name = 'notification_pref';
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name FROM donors ORDER BY donor_name DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, COUNT(donor_interests) AS interests_count FROM donors WHERE array_length(donor_interests, 1) > 1 GROUP BY donor_name, donor_email;

SELECT donors.donor_name, campaigns.campaign_name, donations.donation_amount FROM donors INNER JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id INNER JOIN campaigns ON donations.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id WHERE donations.donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donors.donor_name, JSONB_OBJECT_KEYS(donor_history) AS history_keys FROM donors WHERE jsonb_typeof(donor_history) = 'object';
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT donor_id, amount, donation_date FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT donor_id, category, value FROM preferences WHERE category = 'interest';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_id, category, value FROM preferences WHERE category = 'Health';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT d.first_name, d.last_name, c.campaign_name FROM donors d JOIN campaign_donors cd ON d.donor_id = cd.donor_id JOIN campaigns c ON cd.campaign_id = c.campaign_id;
